page.title: 18Mark Connick's Sunday
page.content: I got up at 7 o'clock and watched{T.V. and had my breakfast of Rice Crispies. I then went next door to see Grandad. Back home I got ready for{Church. After we had been to Church I had my dinner of roast beef and Yorkshire pudding with vegetables. { Matthew Lowther rang up to ask me to go to{Stockcar Racing}at Warton.At the races we watched from the track side but we went to the pits between races. I went back to Matthew's house for tea and we first of all played with model aeroplanes which we had made with{ {LEGO. We had a sandwich and ice-cream tea and then watched{'Goodbye Mr.Chips'} on{T.V.}after which we again played with our planes. I went back home and had some supper,a bath and watched{T.V.}again before going to bed.
